sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-list rounded>
		<!-- v-for="event in events[0].times" -->
		<v-list-item 
			v-for="(event, index) in events"
			:key="index" 
			:to="`/EventPage/${event.name}`" 
			:style="{border: event.border}"
			
		>
		{{event}}
		<!-- @mouseover="hover(true, index)" @mouseleave="hover(false, index)" -->
			<v-row>
				<v-col class="d-flex align-center">
					<v-badge class=" mt-2 eventText" color="red accent-4" :content="event.label"></v-badge>
				</v-col>
				<v-col cols="10">
					<v-list-item-content>
	            <v-list-item-title class="text-wrap eventText" v-text="event.name"></v-list-item-title>
				</v-list-item-content>
				</v-col>
			</v-row>
		</v-list-item>
	</v-list>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	name: 'events',
	props: {
		events: Array
	},
	methods:{
		hover(d, index){
				if (d){
					
					var num = this.time[0].times[index].label
					var circle = document.getElementById("circle" + num)
					circle.style.stroke = "black";
					circle.style.strokeWidth = "2";
				} 
				else{
					// var num = this.time[0].times[index].label
					// var circle = document.getElementById("circle" + num)
					// circle.style.stroke = "none";
				} 
		}
	}
}
</script>

<style type="text/css" scoped>
	.eventText{
		font-size: 12px;
	}
</style>
